title.en: Geological Narrative of the Fault Line

description.ko: 시간과 압력의 원초적인 힘이 지구 지각의 상세한 단면 속에 얼어붙어 있습니다.
description.en: The raw power of time and pressure frozen in a detailed cross-section of the Earth's crust.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of an ancient fault line, revealing jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian, #D2691E red clay, and #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins glowing with internal heat. Detailed textures of parched soil and sediment layers carved by eons of geological pressure. 8k, hyper-realistic. Side lighting from the golden hour creating deep shadows across #2F4F4F bedrock, telling the narrative of the land carved by time.
